mapper.select:
select qa.id, q.question_id, q.question_name, q.question_difficulty, qa.user_id, qa.answer_type, qa.answer_code, qa.answer_flag, qa.answer_time_consume, qa.answer_memory_consume, qa.answer_note, qa.create_time from question_answer as qa left join question as q on q.question_id = qa.question_id
and q.del_flag = 0 and qa.del_flag = 0 and qa.user_id = #{params.userId}
and qa.answer_flag = 'AC'
and qa.answer_flag != 'AC'
and q.question_name like concat ('%', #{params.questionName}, '%')
and q.question_difficulty = #{params.questionDifficulty}
order by
qa.create_time desc,
qa.create_time,
q.question_name desc,
q.question_name,
qa.create_time desc

select sum(if(qa.answer_flag = 'AC', 1, 0)) as acceptedQuestion, sum(if(qa.answer_flag = 'AC' and q.question_difficulty = 'HARD', 1, 0)) as acceptedHardQuestion, sum(if(qa.answer_flag = 'AC' and q.question_difficulty = 'MEDIUM', 1, 0)) as acceptedHardQuestion, sum(if(qa.answer_flag = 'AC' and q.question_difficulty = 'EASY', 1, 0)) as acceptedHardQuestion, sum(if(qa.answer_flag != 'AC', 1, 0)) as unAcceptedQuestion, from question_answer as qa left join question as q on q.del_flag = 0 and qa.question_id = q.question_id
and qa.del_flag = 0 and qa.user_id = #{userId}
